DOC.brief_summary: Spirometry biomedical test measure lung function subject ( may ) chronic respiratory condition . Performing test require certain level train experience health care professional conduct test , sufficient cooperation patient . Although test widely use primary care many country , quality test performance seem limited need improvement order avoid false-positive false-negative test interpretation . In study , researcher investigate whether combination e-learning bimonthly write performance feedback family practice nurse assistance regard spirometry test improve rate adequate test .
DOC.brief_title: Feedback Reports e-Learning Primary Care Spirometry
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Family Practices : collaboration Elkerliek Hospital Helmond regional integrate care support service ( 'QUARTZ ' ) purchase spirometer support service implement spirometry part routine patient care Inclusion Criteria Patients : register one participate family practice perform spirometry test part routine care observation period study Exclusion Criteria Patients : age < 10 year
